name: War on Terror - Fight as Trump or Hillary
name_original: War on Terror - Fight as Trump or Hillary
description:
A terrorist force came into being and started growing fast. It did not take the terror organization much long to take over the middle east and eastern region. International community seeked help from but no aid came. Terrorist started taking over Europe. US, with Mr Grumps "Not My Problem" attitude. Grump's failure resulted in high corruption and crime in US.

Govt. Officials and Federal agents became corrupted. Slowly, US secret services started filling up with terrorists agents. 4th, July 2019, Terrorist force attacked the white house and took over the central command of US govt. Grump and many politicians were captured.

To fight the threat, a consortium of extremely wealthy individuals have come together to form a secret private military force unlike the world has ever seen.

The military force is code named Deathbill and is made up of ex-military forces, and many who have lost family members in the US and abroad due to terror attacks by terrorists. Lets begin WAR ON TERROR.
